programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Hanya Kau Yang Satu.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.(n)

programme.title: Purnama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan keadaan Kampung Cenderang yang menerima ancaman komunis selama 14 hari. Kisah bermula selepas Anum menjadi saksi pertama melihat mayat kakaknya, Salmah digantung di sebatang pokok tidak jauh dari kampung berkenaan.(n)

programme.title: You'Re Still The One
programme.desc: Kisah percintaan jojo terhadap ellise yg tidak dapat dihilangkan walaupon masing- sudah mempunyai kehidupan seindiri. jojo setia menanti ellise sehingga diketahui oleh isterinya.(n)

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.(n)

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. Dia hanya tamat darjah 4 sahaja kerana tidak mampu untuk menyambung pelajaran. Bagaimanapun, dia membuka sekolah kecil untuk mengajar orang-orang bukit dengan sokongan ibu bapanya dan Siwapong rakan sekolahnya yang pulang ke kampung dan membantunya.(n)

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: 2 orang pemuda yang mempunyai wajah yang serupa walaupun tidak mempunyai apa-apa perhubungan. Seorang ialah anak kampung yang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal tetapi gagal kerana tidak berkelulusan tinggi, dan seorang lagi ialah pelakon filem terkenal yang sudah bosan dengan dunianya & inginkan kebebasan.(n)

programme.title: Tmo Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Hanya Kau Yang Satu.(n)

programme.title: Wewe
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga berpindah ke rumah baru yang menakutkan. ibu bapanya sering bergaduh, anak bongsu mereka hilang. Dikatakan bahawa dia telah diambil oleh makhluk ghaib bernama Wewe Gombel.(n)

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda.(n)

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mentuanya, Rusman, menembaknya untuk mengelakkan lebih ramai mangsa. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: SeinfeldVision - The gang at "30 Rock" returns from their summer hiatus.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Jack Gets In The Game - On the heels of Jack (Alec Baldwin) realizing that GE head Don Geiss (Guest Star Rip Torn) may be retiring, Jack's nemesis, Devin, (Guest Star Will Arnett) returns engaged to Don's daughter.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: The Collection - In an effort to cut off any chance of GE digging up dirt against him, Jack (Alec Baldwin) hires his own private investigator, Len (Guest Star Steve Buscemi), to head them off.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Rosemary's Baby - When Liz (Tina Fey) meets her idol, Rosemary Howard (Guest Star Carrie Fisher), she invites her to be a guest writer on the show.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Greenzo - As part of a GE-wide green initiative, Jack (Alec Baldwin) has come up with the idea of creating a green mascot for NBC -- a Philly Fanatic-looking character named Greenzo.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Somebody To Love - Jack (Alec Baldwin) attends a cocktail party honoring Colin Powell, and there, he falls for C.C. (Guest Star Edie Falco), a Democratic congresswoman from Vermont.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Cougars - As part of his community service, Tracy (Tracy Morgan) takes on the duties of coaching an inner city little league team from Knuckle Beach, the worst neighborhood in New York.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Secrets And Lies - C.C. (Edie Falco) wants to go public over her love for Jack (Alec Baldwin), while Liz (Tina Fey) tries to appease both Tracy (Tracy Morgan) and Jenna (Jane Krakowski). With special guest stars Edie Falco and James Carville.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Ludachristmas - It's time again for the office's annual 'Ludachristmas' party and Liz and Jack's families come to visit. Special guests Elaine Stritch, Andy Richter, Buck Henry and Anita Gillette guest star.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Jack (Alec Baldwin) and C.C. (guest star Edie Falco) try to make their long distance love affair work. Liz (Tina Fey) invests in real estate for the first time and Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) gets hooked on caffeine. Special guests include Edie Falco and Gladys Knight.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Someone calls Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) a "Class A Moron" and the New York Post's "Page Six" column picks it up causing Jack agitation. Guest star Rob Huebel.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Subway Hero - Liz's (Tina Fey) old boyfriend, Dennis Duffy (guest star Dean Winters) becomes New York's "Subway Hero" and Jack (Alec Baldwin) wants him booked on the show. Tim Conway guest stars.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Succession - Don Geiss (guest star Rip Torn) confides to Jack (Alec Baldwin) that he will be named the new GE chairman and Jack names a new successor to his position. Will Arnett and Chris Parnell also guest star.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Sandwich Day - Liz's (Tina Fey) ex-boyfriend Floyd (guest star Jason Sudeikis) returns to New York while Jack's (Alec Baldwin) days with GE may be numbered. It's Sandwich Day at "TGS" and the sandwich shop location is kept tightly guarded by the Teamsters. Rip Torn and Brian Dennehy also guest star.(n)

programme.title: 30 Rock S2
programme.desc: Cooter - Jack heads to Washington, DC while Liz has a pregnancy scare, and Kenneth applies to be a page for the Summer Olympics. Tracy is in the final stages of his new invention. Matthew Broderick, Edie Falco, Dean Winters, and Paul Scheer guest star.(n)

programme.desc: A hot-shot journalist is swept up in a movement to challenge Apartheid in 1950s South Africa.(n)

programme.desc: When a beguiling young woman moves in next door, a quiet neighborhood is awakened, bringing people face to face with their secrets and, ultimately, themselves.(n)

programme.desc: Five men who were best friends when they were young kids and are now getting together for the Fourth of July weekend to meet each others' families for the first time. Picking up where they left off, they discover why growing older doesn't mean growing up.(n)

programme.title: Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Built in 1965 around the existing 24-Hour track, the Le Mans Bugatti Grand Prix race circuit lies 5km south of the city of Le Mans and 200km south-west of Paris. The venue has hosted Grand Prix since the late sixties but a serious accident to Spanish rider Alberto Puig in 1995 saw it struck off the calendar until 2000 whilst stringent safety improvements were carried out. Le Mans is a tight track dominated by first gear corners that place the emphasis on late braking and hard acceleration, whilst rear end traction is also a key area. With the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 100,000 spectators, the Bugatti circuit also plays host to the 24 hour truck race, the FIA GP2 Championship, French Touring Car and GT races.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC The Walk
programme.desc: Ep.403: Usman vs Burns - In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.(n)

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton.(n)

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month “Incredible Knockouts” - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, you’ll see the UFC’s biggest names in their most memorable performance.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Chobe River
programme.desc: Deep in southern Africa, a mighty river snakes through untamed wilderness. Its vast flood plains are a magnet for wildlife. In the dry season animals travel great distances to reach this oasis and during droughts space and resources are at a premium. But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Lady Elliot Island
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride’s territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava’s survival skills are still intact.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.(n)

But every animal has its place along the banks of the mighty Chobe river...(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life
programme.desc: It’s spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Source to Sea
programme.desc: All rivers are on a quest, a constant mission to find the ocean, an endless cycle to move water across the vast blue planet. Along the way they support countless lives but their odyssey is by no means easy. From ice to heat, obstacles abound. Yet, despite an ever-changing nature, a river always finds its way - on the journey from Source to Sea.(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Kangaroo Island
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It’s an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Lola the Sea Lion Pup
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. Within this undersea Amazon, a hidden ecosystem goes unnoticed. Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. It is a place where predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race and develop ever-more unlikely ways of attack and defense. On this mucky seabed, nothing is as it seems. It is a place where fish can walk and even change colors.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Maldives - Paradise Shrinking
programme.desc: The Maldives, a low-lying archipelago in the Indian Ocean, faces an uncertain future. Rising sea levels threaten to wipe out this tiny island nation. As the water rises, researchers are using nature to help keep the Maldives from disappearing. They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.(n)

They are rebuilding the reef that protects the islands and may keep the Maldives from disappearing into the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.(n)

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Wetland Wonder
programme.desc: Southern Africa is gripped in a punishing drought. Across the region plants and animals are suffering. At times like this water becomes critical survival and wetlands become magnets for life. This film is a celebration of South Africa’s greatest wetland – Lake St Lucia.(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Christmas Island
programme.desc: Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia’s mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it’s stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - Life in the Muck
programme.desc: The waters surrounding Indonesia’s sprawling archipelago are home to the world’s richest reefs and the highest marine biodiversity on earth. programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mini Giants
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?(n)

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.(n)

programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.(n)

Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.(n)

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing chores—all proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isn’t all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.(n)

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.(n)

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.(n)

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.(n)

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.(n)

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.(n)

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.(n)

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: A Bee's Diary - In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.(n)

programme.title: The Living Beach 1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shores—and there’s plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isn’t all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: Lil' Hunters - Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.(n)

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1
programme.desc: In the Peaks - The air is thin and cold, trees can’t even live here -­‐ it’s not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We’ll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.(n)

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.(n)

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs can’t grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.(n)

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: Dilla’s Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: Bears on the Move - Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: Wine’s New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1
programme.desc: Leaving Home - An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lanka’s kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle… and there’s a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.(n)

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the “big seven”: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.(n)

programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina’s fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic’s toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who’s quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.(n)

programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.(n)

programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.(n)

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn’s final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.(n)

programme.title: Monkey Island 1
programme.desc: Trouble in Paradise - Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.(n)

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.(n)
